text: Oscar is a 1991 American comedy movie directed by John Landis and is the second version of the play of the same name by Claude Magnier. It stars Sylvester Stallone, Marisa Tomei, Ornella Muti, Tim Curry, Chazz Palminteri, Don Ameche, Vincent Spano, Harry Shearer, Eddie Bracken, Linda Gray, Kirk Douglas, Joey Travolta and was distributed by Buena Vista Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by John Landis
title: Oscar (1991 movie)
